articles.author: Aishwarya S Iyer
articles.title: One of the world’s greatest religious spectacles is underway and the numbers are staggering - CNN
articles.description: Millions of Hindu devotees are bathing in sacred waters as the world’s biggest religious gathering begins in India’s northern state of Uttar Pradesh.
articles.content:
Millions of Hindu devotees are bathing in sacred waters as the worlds biggest religious gathering begins in Indias northern state of Uttar Pradesh.
Over the next six weeks, a staggering 400 million … [+3467 chars]
